com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures

Class TextureState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jlreyes.libraries.android_game_engine.sprites.textures.TextureState

  • public class TextureState
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a state that the texture can be in. Each state is broken into frames, each frame contains a reference to the texturePart and the partIndex that
    Author:
    jlreyes
